short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that gets rid of the blue border sometimes surrounding videos on Neon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gets rid of the blue border that sometimes surrounds videos on Neon. 
**We will not collect any information about any user**
This is a utility tool to fix an issue on neontv.co.nz
